summary: A simple mod to hopefully help make the draugr a little less annoying and a little more frightening, while trying to not deviate from the lore.
descriptionHtml:
[size=+1][color=#D3D3D3]About[/size][/color]
A simple mod to hopefully help make the draugr a little less annoying and a little more frightening, while trying to not deviate from the lore. Currently, this is accomplished by making their "aware" sounds deeper, and by making their footsteps more quiet in order to make their approach harder to detect.

[size=+1][color=#D3D3D3]Installation[/size][/color]
Simply install the archive using your favored mod manager utility.

[size=+1][color=#D3D3D3]Uninstallation[/size][/color]
Simply uninstall the archive using your favored mod manager utility. Since these are just audio files, they won't break your game if you remove them.

[size=+1][color=#D3D3D3]Compatibility[/size][/color]
Will be incompatible with other mods that change draugr sounds. Will not be game-breakingly incompatible with anything, as far as I know.

[size=+1][color=#D3D3D3]Known Issues[/size][/color]
[list]
[*] The new aware sounds might sound stupid to your ears. They are likely also currently too deep relative to the other sounds.
[*] The footstep sounds might be too quiet if you are not using [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/43773/?]Audio Overhaul for Skyrim[/url]. I'm not sure.
[/list]

[size=+1][color=#D3D3D3]To Do[/size][/color]
[list]
[*] Change all of the other draugr voice sounds.
[/list]

[size=+1][color=#D3D3D3]Permissions[/size][/color]
Feel free, if you are someone with more motivation than myself, to take these files and add to them by changing the other draugr sounds.

[size=+1][color=#D3D3D3]Credits[/size][/color]
[list]
[*] Bethesda, for the excellent game, and for the original audio files, which I have simply tweaked in Audacity.
[*] Even though he does not ask it, the creator of [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/15034/?]Skyrim User Interface Silencer[/url] for his "silent" sound, which I am using as an optional for the "alert" growl noise.
[/list]
author: tfkillzone

files.name: More Frightening Draugr
files.changelogHtml:
Added modified footstep sounds.
Added modified aware sounds.

files.name: More Frightening Draugr BAIN
files.changelogHtml:
BAIN'd the mod
Added optional silent "alert" sound
